description:
This is my living apartment and I book my vacations base on your booking! 

Since I do live here, I take really care of all my stuff and am choosy about who I invite in. All my belongings are here and that is why I require a deposit that I will return to you after I make sure everything is at where they are supposed to be.

The unit is located in a luxurious doorman building just half block away from the Queesboro Plaza Subway - it is just 10 mins (1 stop!) to Manhattan!

The place has comfy beds (1 queen size bed, 1 single mattress topper, and a small sofa that can host up to 4 people,) high ceilings, a kitchen, and the in-unit washer/dryer. The building has an amazing view, swimming pool and a gym you will be able to access.

You will not be able to use 
- My closets
- My personal belonging (cloths, shoes, bags)
- My liquor and wine

Everything else is totally available!
name: Modern Sunny One Bedroom - 10 Mins to Manhattan
review: The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
